dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Python tools for GATE, see https://github.com/OpenGATE/Gate
dependent_to.name: gatetools

dependent_to.description:
Anvi’o is a comprehensive platform that brings together many aspects of
today’s cutting-edge computational strategies of data-enabled
microbiology, including genomics, metagenomics, metatranscriptomics,
pangenomics, metapangenomics, phylogenomics, and microbial population
genetics in an integrated and easy-to-use fashion through extensive
interactive visualization capabilities.
dependent_to.name: py-anvio

dependent_to.description:
Turn (almost) any command line program into a full GUI application with
one line
dependent_to.name: py-gooey

dependent_to.description: scalable pythonic model fitting for high energy physics
dependent_to.name: py-zfit

description:
Simple library for color and formatting to terminal Very simple Python
library for color and formatting in terminal. Collection of color codes
and names for 256 color terminal setups. The following is a list of 256
colors for Xterm, containing an example of the displayed color, Xterm
Name, Xterm Number and HEX.
name: py-colored

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
